data.text: BIMB的资产数字asset quality是不是有恶化的这个问题了
data.reasoning: The speaker introduces the topic of whether BIMB's asset quality has deteriorated.

data.text: 坊间的传闻呢就路边社的新闻呢就讲BIMB呢好像有一些烂账是因为2021年出事的那个Serba Dinamik就做假账的那个公司所造成的
data.reasoning: This is a rumor circulating about BIMB's bad debts being caused by Serba Dinamik's accounting fraud.

data.text: 6 banks file winding up petition against Serba Dinamik and subsidiaries
data.reasoning: This is a factual statement about legal action taken against Serba Dinamik.

data.text: 2021年的时候呢就直线飙高直接冲到3.5%
data.reasoning: This states a specific percentage increase (3.5%) in the impaired ratio in 2021.

data.text: 到2022财政年度这个数字其实仍然是比较高他的资产已经去到9点多个billion了但是他的这个impaired的数字呢还是有接近260个million
data.reasoning: This provides data on asset size (9+ billion) and impaired assets (around 260 million) in the 2022 fiscal year.

data.text: 我没有证据说啊这个是因为他的这个重组计划造成的反而反而我会认为这个应该是Covid-19疫情发生之后伤害到BIMB的客户群令到他们的财务状况变差了
data.reasoning: The speaker's opinion attributing the asset deterioration to the COVID-19 pandemic's impact on BIMB's customers, rather than the restructuring plan.

data.text: 两份报告分别是来自于这个RHB-OSK以及Kenanga Investment Bank他们都不约而同的提到啊他的asset quality是有隐忧的
data.reasoning: Reports from RHB-OSK and Kenanga Investment Bank both express concerns about BIMB's asset quality.

data.text: 预计在2023年这个情况呢也不会得到明显的改善
data.reasoning: A prediction that the asset quality situation will not significantly improve in 2023.

data.text: 这个GIF就是Gross Impaired Financing Ratio你看这个1.27%是从2021年财政年度的0.96%升到1.27%
data.reasoning: Definition and data regarding the Gross Impaired Financing Ratio (GIF) from 2021 to 2022.

data.text: 他们预计2023年财政年度呢很有可能这个数字呢会上涨但是不会超过1.6%
data.reasoning: A prediction that the GIF ratio will likely increase in the 2023 fiscal year but not exceed 1.6%.

data.text: 到2025年他们的这个五年转型计划之后呢这个数字才会重新下降回来
data.reasoning: A prediction that the GIF ratio will decrease after the five-year transformation plan in 2025.

data.text: 最厉害的是Household sectors就说Bank Islam他的不良资产就收不回来的账变多了
data.reasoning: Identifies the household sector as the primary contributor to BIMB's unrecoverable bad debts.

data.text: 看来这一个才是他的资产数字变坏的根本原因
data.reasoning: The speaker's conclusion that the COVID-19 pandemic's impact on retail customers is the root cause of BIMB's asset deterioration.

data.text: 如果真的是这两个原因造成这个股价的下跌so what’s the next是不是跌出价值了
data.reasoning: Questioning whether the stock price decline due to the mentioned reasons represents a value opportunity.

data.text: MBSB的股价是接近65sen 他的每股资产是1块2毛半现在他的股价对比他的每股资产就是市净率只有0.52倍

data.text: BIMB的营业额3.5billion净利润可以赚四五亿而且是跌下来之后啊那么MBSB呢它的利润刚刚上来啊4亿多然后营业额呢只有20多亿
data.reasoning: Compares the revenue and profit of BIMB and MBSB.

data.text: BIMB的这个估值再大幅度下降的空间应该是比较有限的
data.reasoning: The speaker's opinion that BIMB's valuation has limited room for further significant decline.

data.text: BIMB的股价1块92 他的每股资产是接近3块钱对吗说他的Price to Book就只有0.64倍
